algorithm: New algorithm description: The new algorithm calculates the scores for the bins using a modified formula. It takes the logarithm of the item size and multiplies it by the logarithm of the maximum capacity divided by the sum of the remaining capacities of all the bins.
code:
import numpy as np
import math

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    rest_capacity = max_capacity - bins
    rest_capacity_sum = np.sum(rest_capacity)
    scores = (np.log(item) * np.log(max_capacity / rest_capacity_sum))
    return scores
